words.clue: un poligono de cinco lados se llama

l10n.couldNotGenerateCrossword: Could not generate a crossword with the given words. Please try again with fewer words or words that have more characters in common. If you are using fixed words, please make sure that their position doesn't prevent other words from being placed.
l10n.couldNotGenerateCrosswordTooFewWords: Could not generate a crossword. You need at least two words.

a11y.crosswordGrid: Crossword grid. Use arrow keys to navigate and keyboard to enter characters. Use tab to use input fields instead.
a11y.check: Check the characters. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11y.showSolution: Show the solution. The crossword will be filled with its correct solution.
a11y.retry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
